question.body: What will happen to the level of exercise tolerance in a person whose heart is being paced by the AV node?

multiple_choice.choice: Level of exercise tolerance will decrease.
Level of exercise tolerance will stay the same.
Level of exercise tolerance will increase.

response.feedback: Correct. The AV node paces the heart more slowly than the SA node, and has less ability to generate high heart rates. This limits the amount of blood being pumped by the heart and decreased our ability to exert ourselves.
Incorrect. Because the AV node paces the heart more slowly than the SA node, this has an effect on exercise tolerance.
Incorrect. Because the AV node paces the heart more slowly than the SA node, it does not aid us during exercise.

part.hint: Consider how heart rate contributes to our ability to exert ourselves.
